  {

    "AbilityUnitDamageType"     "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
    "AbilityCastAnimation"      "ACT_DOTA_DISABLED"
    "AbilityDamage"         "400 600 800 1000"
    
    "precache"
    {
      "particle"          "particles/econ/generic/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1.vpcf"

    }

    // Item Info
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityManaCost"       "300"
    "SideShop"            "1"
    
    "OnSpellStart"
    {
      "ApplyModifier"
      {
        "Target"    "CASTER"
        "ModifierName"  "modifier_channel_start"
      }
      "FireSound"
      {
        "EffectName"    "Hero_Gyrocopter.CallDown.Fire"
        "Target"      "CASTER"
      }
    }
    
    "OnChannelSucceeded"
    {
      "RemoveModifier"
      {
        "Target"        "CASTER"
        "ModifierName"      "modifier_channel_start"
      }
      "AttachEffect"
      {
        "EffectName"      "particles/econ/generic/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1.vpcf"

        "EffectRadius"      "%radius"
        "EffectDurationScale" "1"
        "EffectLifeDurationScale" "1"
        "EffectColorA"      "255 0 0"
        "EffectColorB"      "255 0 0"
        "Target"      "CASTER"
      }
      
      "Damage"
      {
        "Type"          "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"

        "Target"
        {
          "Center"      "CASTER"

        }
      }
      
      "Knockback"
      {

          "Center"  "CASTER"

        }

        "Height"  "%height"
      }
      
      "FireSound"
      {
        "EffectName"    "Hero_Gyrocopter.CallDown.Damage"
        "Target"      "CASTER"
      }
    }
    
    "OnChannelFinish"
    {
      "RemoveModifier"
      {
        "Target"        "CASTER"
        "ModifierName"      "modifier_channel_start"
      }
    }
    
    "OnChannelInterrupted"
    {
      "RemoveModifier"
      {
        "Target"    "CASTER"
        "ModifierName"  "modifier_channel_start"
      }
    }

				}

				{
					"ScriptFile"			"abilities/chaos_meteor.lua"

				}
			}
		}

        }

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	{
		"soundfile"						"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_kunkka.vsndevts"

	}

	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"				"heroes/torrent.lua"

			"Target"					"POINT"
		}

		{
			"ScriptFile"				"heroes/torrent.lua"

			"Target"					"POINT"
		}

		{
			"Delay"						"%delay"
			"Action"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"			"heroes/torrent.lua"
					"Function"				"torrent_emit_sound"
					"Target"				"POINT"
				}

				{
					"Target"				"CASTER"

					{
						"00"				"POINT"
					}
				}

				{
					"Target"
					{
						"Center"			"POINT"

					}

					{

						}

							"Target"			"TARGET"

						}

						}

				}				
			}
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{

{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"

	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"novaa"
	"AOERadius"						"%radius"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"700"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3 0.3 0.3 0.3"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"55"
	
	// Damage.
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityDamage"					"650 800 900"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"300 400 500"
	
	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "duration" "4.5"
            "radius" "700"
            "movespeed_slow" "-40 -50 -60"
            "attackspeed_slow" "-80 -100 -120"
            "vision_duration" "6.0"
            "vision_radius" "900"
        }
	
	// Data driven
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireEffect"
		{
			"TargetPoint"			"POINT"
			"EffectName"			"particles/econ/items/crystal_maiden/crystal_maiden_cowl_of_ice/maiden_crystal_nova_cowlofice.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"		"world_origin"
			"ControlPoints"
			{
				"01"				"%radius 2 %radius*2"
			}
		}
		
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"			"yoshino.zayac_attack"
			"Target"				"CASTER"
		}
	
		"ActOnTargets"
		{
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"		"POINT"
				"Radius"		"%radius"
				"Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY" 
				"Type"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
			}
			
			"Action"
			{
				"Damage"
				{
					"Target"	"TARGET"
					"Damage"	"%AbilityDamage"
					"Type"		"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
				}
				
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"TARGET"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_crystal_nova_slow_datadriven"
				}
			}
		}
		
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"		"heroes/crystal_nova.lua"
			"Function"			"crystal_nova_post_vision"
			"Target"			"POINT"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_crystal_nova_slow_datadriven"
		{
			"Duration"				"%duration"
			"EffectName"			"particles/generic_gameplay/generic_slowed_cold.vpcf"
			"StatusEffectName"		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_frost_lich.vpcf"
			"StatusEffectPriority"	"10"
		
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"	"%attackspeed_slow"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%movespeed_slow"
			}
		}
	}

"acid_spray_datadriven"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityType"							"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"novaa"
	"AOERadius"						"625"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.2"
	"AbilityCastRange"				"900"

	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"50 45 40"
	
	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"250 300 350"
	
	// Special	
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "radius" "800"
            "duration" "7 8 9"
            "damage" "75 125 155"
            "slow" "-80 -90 -100"
            "tick_rate" "0.5"
        }

	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"	"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_alchemist.vsndevts"
		"particle"  "particles/alchemist_acid_spray1.vpcf"
	}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
	 	"CreateThinker"
	 	{
	 		"ModifierName"	"modifier_acid_spray_thinker"
	 		"Target" 		"POINT"
	 	}
	} 

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_acid_spray_thinker"
		{
			"Aura"					"modifier_acid_spray"
			"Aura_Radius"			"%radius"
			"Aura_Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
			"Aura_Types"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_MECHANICAL"
			
			"Duration"				"%duration"

			"OnCreated"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/acid_spray.lua"
					"Function"		"AcidSpraySound"
				}

				"AttachEffect"
				{
					"EffectName"		"particles/alchemist_acid_spray1.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
					"Target"			"TARGET"
					"ControlPoints"
					{
						"00" "0 0 0"
						"01" "%radius 1 1"
						"15" "25 150 25"
						"16" "0 0 0"
					}
				}
			}
		}

		"modifier_acid_spray"
		{
			"IsDebuff"		"1"
			"ThinkInterval"	"%tick_rate"
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"	"%slow"
			}
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"FireSound"
				{
					"EffectName" 	"Hero_Alchemist.AcidSpray.Damage"
					"Target"		"TARGET"
				}
				"Damage"
				{
					"Target"		 "TARGET"
					"Type"			 "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
					"Damage"		 "%damage"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_CUSTOM"
	"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"blackrock5"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"          "ACT_DOTA_CHANNEL_ABILITY_5"
	"MaxLevel"                      "1"
	"RequiredLevel"                 "30"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"3500"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"160"
	"AbilityChannelTime"			"3.0"

	// Damage.
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityDamage"					"7000"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"450"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "damage_reduction" "0"
            "speed_reduction" "0.0 0.0 0.0 0.0"
            "arrow_width" "300"
            "arrow_range" "3800"
            "arrow_speed" "3000.0 3000.0 3000.0 3000.0"
            "tree_width" "75 75 75 75"
            "vision_radius" "400 400 400 400"
            "vision_duration" "3.34 3.34 3.34 3.34"
            "charge_interval" "0.01"
            "damage_per_interval" "0.01"
            "charge_time" "1.0"
        }
	
	// Data driven
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"EffectName"			"blackrock.shooter"
		}

		// Reset speed and damage variables and set timer for channel
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"			"heroes/powershot.lua"
			"Function"				"powershot_initialize"
			"Target"				"POINT"
		}
		
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"ModifierName"			"modifier_powershot_charge_datadriven"
		}		
	}
	
	"OnChannelFinish"
	{
		"RemoveModifier"
		{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"ModifierName"			"modifier_powershot_charge_datadriven"
		}
		
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"			"heroes/powershot.lua"
			"Function"				"powershot_start_traverse"
		}
	}
	
	"OnProjectileHitUnit"
	{
		"DeleteOnHit"				"false"
	
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"			"heroes/powershot.lua"
			"Function"				"powershot_register_unit"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_powershot_charge_datadriven"
		{
			"Duration"				"%charge_time"
		
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/powershot.lua"
					"Function"		"powershot_charge"
				}
			}
		
			"ThinkInterval"			"%charge_interval"
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/powershot.lua"
					"Function"		"powershot_charge"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

"phoenix_icarus_dive_datadriven"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"

	"AbilityTextureName"			"x_stream"
	"MaxLevel"                      "1"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.2"

	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"20"
	"AbilityDuration"				"2.0"
	
	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"
	
	// Special	
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "hp_cost_perc" "0"
            "dash_length" "1000"
            "dash_width" "500"
            "hit_radius" "400"
            "burn_duration" "2"
            "damage_per_second" "350"
            "burn_tick_interval" "1.0"
            "slow_movement_speed_pct" "-25"
            "dash_duration" "2"
        }
	
	// Data driven
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"precache"
	{
		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_phoenix/phoenix_icarus_dive.vpcf"
		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_phoenix/phoenix_icarus_dive_burn_debuff.vpcf"
	}
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"		"x.stream2"
			"Target"			"CASTER"
		}
		
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"Target"		"CASTER"
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_icarus_dive_caster_datadriven"
		}
		
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"		"heroes/icarus_dive.lua"
			"Function"			"CastIcarusDive"
			
			"hp_cost"			"%hp_cost_perc"
			"dash_length"		"%dash_length"
			"dash_width"		"%dash_width"
			"dash_duration"		"%dash_duration"
			
			"modifier_caster_name"	"modifier_icarus_dive_caster_datadriven"
			"sub_ability_name"		"phoenix_icarus_dive_stop_datadriven"
		}
	}
	

	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_icarus_dive_caster_datadriven"
		{
			"IsHidden"	"1"
			
			"Duration"		"%dash_duration"
			
			"EffectName"		"particles/phoenix_icarus_dive1.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
			
			"Aura"			"modifier_icarus_dive_check_to_burn_datadriven"
			"Aura_Radius"	"%hit_radius"
			"Aura_Teams"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
			"Aura_Types"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_MECHANICAL"
			
			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			}
			
			"OnStateChanged"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"heroes/icarus_dive.lua"
					"Function"			"CheckToInterrupt"
					
					"modifier_caster_name"	"modifier_icarus_dive_caster_datadriven"
				}
			}
			
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_ignore_turn_rate_limit_datadriven"
				}
			}
			
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"heroes/icarus_dive.lua"
					"Function"			"EndIcarusDive"
					
					"sub_ability_name"	"phoenix_icarus_dive_stop_datadriven"
				}
				
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_ignore_turn_rate_limit_datadriven"
				}
				
				"FireSound"
				{
					"EffectName"		"x.stream1"
					"Target"			"CASTER"
				}
			}
		}
		
		"modifier_icarus_dive_check_to_burn_datadriven"
		{
			"Duration"		"0.1"
		
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"heroes/icarus_dive.lua"
					"Function"			"CheckToBurn"
					"Target"			"TARGET"
					
					"modifier_burn_name"	"modifier_icarus_dive_burn_datadriven"
				}
			}
		}
		
		"modifier_icarus_dive_burn_datadriven"
		{
			"IsDebuff"	"1"
			"Duration"	"%burn_duration"
			
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_phoenix/phoenix_icarus_dive_burn_debuff.vpcf"

			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"Damage"
				{
					"Target"	"TARGET"

				}
			}
			
			"Properties"

				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%slow_movement_speed_pct"
			}
		}

		{
			"IsHidden"	"1"
		}
	}

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        {
            "wolf_index" "1 2 3 4"
            "wolf_duration" "55.0 55.0 55.0 55.0"
            "wolf_bat" "1.25 1.2 1.15 1.1"
            "wolf_damage" "18 29 37 46"
            "wolf_hp" "100 150 200 250"
            "wolf_1_count" "1 0 0 0"
            "wolf_2_count" "0 1 0 0"
            "wolf_3_count" "0 0 1 0"

		}

		}

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"				"heroes/thunder_tornado1.lua"
			"Function"					"torrent_bubble_allies"
			"Target"					"POINT"
		}

		{
			"ScriptFile"				"heroes/thunder_tornado1.lua"
			"Function"					"torrent_vision"
			"Target"					"POINT"
		}
		
		"DelayedAction"
		{
			"Delay"						"%delay"
			"Action"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"			"heroes/thunder_tornado1.lua"
					"Function"				"torrent_emit_sound"
					"Target"				"POINT"
				}
			
				"FireEffect"
				{
					"Target"				"CASTER"
					"EffectName"			"particles/jin_mori_thunder_god_tornado1.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType"		"start_at_customorigin"
					"EffectRadius"			"%radius"
					"ControlPoints"
					{
						"00"				"POINT"
					}
				}
			
				"ActOnTargets"
				{
					"Target"
					{
						"Center"			"POINT"
						"Radius"			"%radius"
						"Teams"				"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
						"Types"				"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
					}
					
					"Action"
					{						
						"RemoveModifier"
						{
							"Target"			"TARGET"
							"ModifierName"		"modifier_knockback"
						}
						
						"Knockback"
						{
							"Target"			"TARGET"
							"Center"			"CASTER"
							"Duration"			"%stun_duration"
							"Distance"			"0"
							"Height"			"3000"
							"IsFixedDistance"	"1"
							"ShouldStun"		"1"
						}
						
						"ApplyModifier"
						{
							"Target"			"TARGET"
							"ModifierName"		"modifier_torrent_damage_thinker_datadriven"
						}

						"Damage"
						{
							"Target"			"TARGET"
							"Damage"			"9000"

						}

						{
							"Target"			"TARGET"

						}						
					}
				}				
			}
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
